title: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: I don't understand the issue with Bug 8142. When I try to view the class hierarchies of internal JARs in a binary project (org.apache.ant), I see the message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'. Can someone please explain what this message means? Besides, the expected behavior is to display the class hierarchies of the internal JARs.
OB: When I try to view the class hierarchies of internal JARs in a binary project (org.apache.ant), I see the message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.
EB: The expected behavior is to display the class hierarchies of the internal JARs in a binary project (org.apache.ant).
SR: 1. Open a binary project (org.apache.ant). 2. Attempt to view the class hierarchies of the internal JARs. 3. Observe the message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.
